hadiths.text: It was narrated from Tariq bin Shihab that:a man asked the Prophet, when he had put his leg in the stirrup: "Which kind of Jihad is best?'" He said: " a word of truth spoken before an unjust rulers

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ مَنْ تَكَلَّمَ بِالْحَقِّ عِنْدَ إِمَامٍ جَائِرٍ
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of The One Who Speaks The Truth Before An Unjust Ruler
